item.title: [EU / CA][Dedicated Servers] - Network
item.description:
Nov 14, 13:18 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 14/11/2022 12:00 UTC
Service impact : We are currently have issue on some services of network dedicated servers such as (add/remove vmacs) , move ip).
Customers have access to their dedicated servers.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

End Time : 14/11/2022 12:40 UTC
Service impact : Public and private network were temporarily unavailable for rack E102A03
Root cause : An electrical maintenance caused the incident: Maintenance link
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
